Spells:
Cure Critical Wounds (Healer4 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 4d8+20 HP (DC 17 Will half)
Cure Light Wounds (Healer1 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 1d8+5 HP (DC 14 Will half)

Cure Serious Wounds (Healer3 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 3d8+15 HP (DC 16 Will half)
Heal (Healer7 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 150 HP and removes negative conditions
Lesser Restoration (Healer2 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched or heals 1d4 temporary ability damage, removes fatigue, and reduces exhaustion
Mass Cure Light Wounds (Healer5 Conj): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 1d8+20 HP (DC 18 Will half)
Neutralize Poison (Healer3 Conj): Touched neutralized 200 min, immunized, or detoxified
Raise Dead (Healer5 Conj): Restores willing soul, dead up to 20 dy, to its touched corpse
Regenerate (Healer9 Conj): Touched regrows maims, heals 4d8+20 HP, eliminates fatigue, exhaustion, and nonlethal damage
Remove Blindness/Deafness (Healer3 Conj): Touched healed of blindness or deafness
Remove Disease (Healer3 Conj): Touched cured of all diseases
Restoration (Healer4 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched and heals all temporary ability damage, restores 1 drained ability, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores 1 drained level
